website_summaries.verdict: Boasting an attractive 2-piece design that keeps soap dry and counters clean, this soap dish ticks all the boxes. The best on the market.
pros: Solid ceramic dish is classy and durable
Stainless steel insert keeps soap raised off the bottom of the dish for effective drying
2-piece design is highly functional and easy to clean
Fits most bar soap sizes and shapes

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I make soap and i wanted something pretty and simple that would allow the soap to dried and not get mushy. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: ChicoReader

customer_reviews.title: Good Soap Dish
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to be able to find a soap dish like this one. Keeps the soap from getting all soggy and gooey . If there is ANYTHING I HATE it's a wet slimy soft semi dissolved bar of soap . Plenty of space for an average bar of bath soap. Stainless liner can be removed and easily washed . I like this soap dish . Looked for a LONG TIME before I found it . Good design. Good product . Good price . Came in two days with Prime as promised . I am well satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive but isn't.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice soap dish. I've tried others that either tended to rust, or didn't look as nice as their pictures, but this one has neither issue. It looks way more expensive than its price would suggest, and after six weeks in the shower, there is not a hint of rust. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sir KeithTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Search No Further -- This is What you Need!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a stainless soap dish with a drain for a very long time when I saw this ceramic dish with the stainless drain. It was just perfect. for our modern shower. It is very classy looking and keeps the soap from getting all gooey and soggy. We love it so much, that we just ordered another one. In fact, we may even order some more for the entire family for Christmas. You will not be disappointed if you purchase this product. Thanks Passionier!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Oncken

customer_reviews.title: No more puddled water/lather in my soap dish!
customer_reviews.text: I actually LOVE this soap dish!! I've purchased multiple soap dishes over the years and put up with cleaning soap lather/residue/puddled water from soap dishes - a repetitive oxymoron!!!! This dish is easy& fast to drain, rinse and clean; and it keeps the soap bar dry! The design is simple and purposeful which lends well to my sink top aesthetic! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: pinc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concave design eliminates underside gooeyness
customer_reviews.text: Because it's concave only the edges of the bar come in contact with the solid part of the tray. There is virtually none of the gooeyness that plagues other soap trays I've used.
customer_reviews.author: TomNewYork

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Piece For Our Nitch
customer_reviews.text: We were needing something white, that matched the tile in our bathroom, but with a durable non-rusting holder, and a holder that does not mold. This little piece is perfect. Not too cumbersome, takes up very little room in our nitch, yet provides room for even an oversized bar of soap. I have been using it for 2 months. So far, no rust. One suggestion is would be for the bottom to have small silicone pad at the corners. I am careful when moving it, so it does not scrape the tile's finish. The price is priced well, arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy P.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of this soap dish. It does a good job of keeping water off of the soap and keeps most of the soap mess under the metal grate so you can't see it. It's easy to clean when it needs it and comes with a nice little non slip silicon pad to go under it. Perfect little soap holder.
customer_reviews.author: aglowucannotsee

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for dish washing block!
customer_reviews.text: A review for a soap dish? Sure. I searched for the perfect soap dish and this turned out to be it! I was searching for something that would fit a (vegan) dish washing block I recently purchased in an effort to be more eco conscious / zero waste. Why is this one prefect? The block fits prefect and sits on top of metal drainage piece, so that it is not soaking in a nasty mess. And it’s ceramic, as we haven’t had the best of luck with some wooden kitchen like products and water / mold issues. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Attractive and Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly well-constructed for the price. We keep this by the kitchen sink to hold a bar of olive-oil hand soap and after a year of daily use, and despite being wet most of the time, the insert shows no sign of rust. The ceramic dish itself is nicely finished, with no bubbles, crazing or other obvious flaws, and the steel insert is heavier-gauge and more sturdy than expected. Had low expectations when I bought this, but it has proven to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: therealmaxernst

customer_reviews.title: Great for my homemade soap!
customer_reviews.text: This dish is good-looking, sturdy and lets water drain away from my homemade soap so it doesn't get soft, and gives that water and soap residue a place to collect. I've tried many, many models, and this is probably my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Halcyon

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these in January and all have started to rust. Nice and simple design, but very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: mickymouth

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Can't answer this because it was broken when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Exudes Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I know it’s a soap dish, and yes, I actually researched them. It wasn’t expensive, but you would never know by the quality. It’s heavy, the stainless steel is polished to perfection and not a flaw on it. Hey, it even comes with it’s own little rubber mat, so it won’t slide around. I rarely write reviews, but I always appreciate getting more than I expect!
customer_reviews.author: Skkywlk

customer_reviews.title: Smallish
customer_reviews.text: Nice soap dish but it was too small for the homemade soaps that we have.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Supinger

customer_reviews.title: Fit and finish were perfect on both pieces of the soap dish (ceramic cup ...
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and well made - definitely a quality accessory for our newly remodeled bathrooms. Fit and finish were perfect on both pieces of the soap dish (ceramic cup and stainless grate). Ordered four and all were flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Red1950

customer_reviews.title: Does what it promises
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and good looking soap dish. Looks elegant and the soap stays dry because the soap water drains down. You have to clean it here and there of course. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The first 2 are exactly what we wanted for bar soap since liquid soap is a bit had to find these days. High quality, solid, like the silicone no-slip pad. I guess the fact we're ordering 2 more says it all.
customer_reviews.author: G Malow

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly hard to find a good soap dish, but I now have!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this dish and the little mat that's included for it. I assume it's for anti-slip. Obsessed! I'm very happy with the value of this item, given all the plastic crappy ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sims

customer_reviews.title: A simply styled, well made product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about a year and am just now ordering another for the powder room. It’s a simple style and very sturdy, easy to clean, attractive and utilitarian.
customer_reviews.author: P.M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dish for an apartment I use only one week a month. After one month the "stainless steel" began to rust along the edges of the steel soap interface. The rust came off but I expect it on my return.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great little dish
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about it. Stylish, keeps the soap dry. I put some silicon stick-on feet on the bottom so that there's slight clearance and it's not ceramic on ceramic contact.
customer_reviews.author: Cuprous

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap dish
customer_reviews.text: I use a specific bar soap to wash my face. I tired of cleaning a mushy soap dish. This one is nicer and sturdier than I expected; pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ACE SUPERSTAR

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is in a wall niche in my stand up shower. It's very study and heavy so it doesn't move and doesn't shift during use. Very easy to clean just takes a quick rinse. Threw away a metal one that was leaving rust stains in my shower. It also was easy to shift and fell to the floor several times.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Lady

customer_reviews.title: Rusted easily
customer_reviews.text: I liked the simplicity of this, but ours rusted pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Dish moves around.
customer_reviews.text: Soap dish comes with stainless steel insert that goes into it nicely. The only difficult thing is that the dish is quite heavy and slippery with the feet on the bottom that it comes with a rubber pad as an extra piece.
customer_reviews.author: Nola McIlvin

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Came cracked and broken in sealed bag. Sent it back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant product
customer_reviews.text: I appreciat the minimalist design of this article. It should last 100 years and the honesty of the design won't go out of style.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jones

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, is nice.
customer_reviews.text: The soap is always ready for service, the stainless steel tray is easy to wash, as is the moderately thick ceramic dish. Love it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: The House

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the soap dry!
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, nice design, one of the few soap holders I found that will catch the water so that your soap is not sitting in muck. Now if only my husband would remember to put the soap in the soap holder and not on the sink, this thing would work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KatclimberTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Look just as pictured. Look nice in the bathroom. Easy to take metal part out and clean. Keeps soap out of the moisture and prevents that damp scum from forming.
customer_reviews.author: Alsal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. I've had this product 2 weeks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. I've had this product 2 weeks and it already has rust stains all over it. For something that is meant to be used in a bathroom this is unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Angela L.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps bar of soap from getting “goopy”
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of keeping the bar of soap from getting “goopy”. It’s easy to clean too. Sturdy construction. Can definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kmob

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Sink Clean!
customer_reviews.text: Great soap dish! I’ve been using a black soap that I like and this dish keeps it from making a mess of my sink! I just wash it out. The little mat that comes with it keeps it from sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product the a soap dish addition.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great No rust noted yet. For me 4 stars because it didn't include or offer feet for the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: I assure you this is not one of those 99 cent items and you’ll be happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this item because Amazon is flooded with low quality 99 cent store items selling in the $10 range. I assure you this is not one of those 99 cent items and you’ll be happy with this. Nice and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Helmholtz_Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great soap dish!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this. Like others here, I read up on many, many soap dishes on Amazon, and I'm glad I ordered this one. It works great, and I think it'll last forever as long as I don't somehow knock it off the counter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good, serviceable soap dish
customer_reviews.text: This soap dish works relatively well to keep the soap from getting squishy, and is fairly easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Rusts, bad quality steel, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This product only has to do very few things, and it failed by rusting after 2 months. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than the picture
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, well made. I wasn't expecting much from the pictures, but it exceeded my expectations. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap dish to use with handmade soaps that turn into gooey messes in regular soap dishes. This soap dish has kept my soaps dry! I plan to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love these soap dishes
customer_reviews.text: Love these soap dishes! I bought 2 to match our remodeled main bath, and they look great. I like the removable stainless tray, since it makes them really way to clean and keep them looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah VanDuinen

customer_reviews.title: Soap holder is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This soap holder looks good, is made of ceramic (pretty) and the removable stainless steel part keeps the soap dry and will be very easy to clean. There is no plastic. I like this. It will biodegrade over time and/or I can recycle it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lischer

customer_reviews.title: These look great.
customer_reviews.text: These look awesome in my bathroom, colors compliment the shower nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sponge Dish
customer_reviews.text: My sponges last longer since using this; no more stingy sponge smell, allows it to dry out completely. Also looks sleek on the counter!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this soap dish and it's very nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this soap dish and it's very nicely made. I wanted a dish that would keep soap dry but also look nice and of good quality. This one does the job!. It's also very easy to clean in between uses. LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marylou F.

customer_reviews.title: KEEPS YOUR SOAP HIGH AND DRY - NO MORE SLIMY SOAP.
customer_reviews.text: I've always become irritated and grossed out by the soap slime that collects at the bottom of the soap dish. That is the reason I ordered this soap dish which I can take apart and clean, yet it keeps my soap high and dry. I BOUGHT TWO AND I LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional design
customer_reviews.text: Simple beautiful design. Just got it so can’t rate durability
customer_reviews.author: M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The yellow rubber mat that comes with it is kinda cheesy. The color makes it look dirty . But the actual product is very high quality
customer_reviews.author: Woad

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy loud metal sounds
customer_reviews.text: Makes metal sounds since there is no rubber to prevent clacking sounds. Also hard on the bottom returning.
customer_reviews.author: C.Wizzy

customer_reviews.title: Minimalistic functional pretty soap dish
customer_reviews.text: love the minimalistic design. The dish is easy to clean, it doesn’t look messy and I like the fact that the soap doesn’t sit in a pool of water.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking / Clean Soap
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my selection as it looks great in my bathroom and it is keeping my bar of soap from melting away. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: It’s intended to hold the soap and it does.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good soap dish. It is attractive and sturdy but most importantly, since we started using it the soap had not escaped and made a run for the shower floor. We sleep better knowing the soap will still be in the dish when we wake up.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap Dish
customer_reviews.text: Great soap dish. Sturdy, stylish, and functional. Great seller. The product came packaged well and faster than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S

customer_reviews.title: best soapdish ever
customer_reviews.text: So easy to clean--it's stylish and well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Dart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the tub.
customer_reviews.text: I hate soap that gets too slimy , this one allows the water to drain out of the soap to keep it nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: It was nicer than I thought after I received it. Solid build and nice neutral color of white. Sits nicely in my walk in shower.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: GOLDILOCKS AWARD
customer_reviews.text: This is SO much easier to clean than any other soap dishes/holders I've used AND it looks very streamlined which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Exactly what I was looking for! Super classy! Easy to clean and soap doesn’t stick to the point it’s hard to pick up like most dishes. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised that the soap dish looks even better in real life than it does in the photo. Very nice in my newly remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: KJC

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in our shower, works perfect and looks classy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice looking, great design
customer_reviews.text: This soap dish fits well in our minimalist home with it's simple yet cute look. The design of the dish is also nice allowing the soap bar to drain and not get soap scum all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Aen

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap dish.
customer_reviews.text: Okay its a soap dish - but it is a nice one. Looks classy - easy to clean in shower (just rinse it out) and its not plastic. Also has rubber mat so it doesn't slip. I am going to buy two more for some sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Michael Grady

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a year for a soap dish that has a raised lid so my soap does not sit in water. It met my need perfectly. It is well constructed and nice looking. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality, exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Classy and clean soap holder, perfect to pick up a soap bar in the shower easily, looks nice, reduces sogginess in soap bars
customer_reviews.author: emily m.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described. Works well in my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Mela1953

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs
customer_reviews.text: A very nice soap dish. Lets the fluid seep to the bottom and away from the soap. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C. Lheureux

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my home!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece! It looks very elegant and is easy to keep clean. I don’t know about the durability - I haven’t dropped it yet. But I expect it not to be very durable since it’s ceramic.
customer_reviews.author: Farhad

customer_reviews.title: Fit my needs
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sturdy holder for our dish sponge and it fits the bill. Nice-looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The metal part rusted after just 4 months. Very disappointing. I wanted to return it, but the return window has closed. Would not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wagman

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Heavy and substantive. I am going to order one for every bathroom as I am trying to reduce the amount of plastic I purchase. Great find. Very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I really like this soap dish. I'll probably buy one or two more.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: form & function
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't experienced wear and tear, but is a beautiful and functional addition to my bathroom. Great design of classic marble and utilitarian stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: C volp

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep a purple bar of soap I had from leaving residue in my white shower. It works perfectly for that. It is very easy to clean as the tray and base are two separate pieces. Great item for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary A.

customer_reviews.title: Functional soap dish
customer_reviews.text: Attractive functional soap dish that helps address mushy bar soap.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: No Residue
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I keep my Lush shampoo bar and a boutique body wash bar of soap on it. No mess anymore. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Have one in each bathroom. Quality. Easy to clean. Love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars. Not as described. Not polished on bottom. Will add felt dots to protect surface.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, solid & easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I received this product 4 months ago & waited before writing my review. This dish is beautiful and solid but not overly heavy. I have it in the bathroom & am thinking of buying more as gifts. It has been easy to clean and my 6 oz bar of soap fits perfectly in it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works as expected and looks really great. Also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We are loving these! Easy to clean, catches all soap residue. Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks classy and not cheap... hasn’t rusted. Good quality... I used it to hold my charcoal bar soap and it doesn’t stain black it washes clean very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kewii

customer_reviews.title: Could have been really nice...
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic tray arrived with a chip on the inside. When I go to put the steel soap holder inside of it, it doesn't sit flat as the ceramic soap dish is not a perfect rectangle leaving one corner sticking up at an angle. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sanitary way to hold your soap
customer_reviews.text: Why doesn't the non-slip bad have the Lofekea name on it like it does in the Image? Is anything else different? Pretty to the eye and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this for my modern farmhouse style! I’m going to have to buy another for the guest bathroom. I’m hoping the insert doesn’t rust, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap dish! Great quality and perfect size to fit large bars of soap.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and classy
customer_reviews.text: Nice plastic-free soap dish looks great in our all white kitchen and bathrooms

customer_reviews.title: Gets rusty
customer_reviews.text: Dont like that the steel plate the soap sits on gets rusty. Wouldnt buy again

customer_reviews.title: looks good, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, does the job. Got here in one day!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Leandro

customer_reviews.title: looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: looks just like the picture, was packaged well for delivery. I chose this because it is ceramic and matches the sink, allows the soap to drain through the metal insert, but not all over the sink counter. So far it looks like it will do the job well! My current bar of soap is slightly long for the dish, but as it gets used up it will fit better. After we've used it a while I will re-review if it merits 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Broken when recieved
customer_reviews.text: Just received this soap dish and it was broken in several pieces.

customer_reviews.text: Heavy and seems well made but started rusting after just a few weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and quality item
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something durable and elegant for your restroom I would definitely say go with this one. I bought this one because, I needed something that drained the water from the soap and this one works well.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As described. Fast shipping and goes well with our white subway tile.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, clean lines, nice soap dish
customer_reviews.text: Good soap dish, looked for a long time to find one that would collect excess water and not drown the soap.

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps soap from getting gooey or wasted. Money well spent!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems like it will last a lifetime. Heavy duty and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Chetan B Patel

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap dish!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Much nicer than I thought. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: irina leibowitz

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's ceramic and stainless
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely little soap dish that is more compact than others I've seen on Amazon. I like that it's ceramic and stainless, rather than plastic. The stainless rack inside keeps the soap dry and therefore lasting longer.
customer_reviews.author: YEF

customer_reviews.title: great soap dish
customer_reviews.text: It is very attractive. Looks streamline and expensive. Prevents soggy soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lofekea Ceramic Soap Dish Stainless Steel Soap Holder for Bathroom and Shower Double Layer Draining Soap Box
product_meta.description:
Do you still worry where you can put the soap when taking a bath or washing hands? 

Using Lofekea soap dish can give you an amazing result.

Then I will tell you the reason. 

Made of stainless steel and premium cermic,very sturdy and much longer service life than plastic. 

Dual-layer design easy to clean,and keep soap clean.

Functional,they can be used for bathroom,kitchen,bathtube and counter top

Elegant and generous design can make your life more comfortable.

Take soap easily,the best choice for you.

Size: 5 x 3.7 x 1.7 inches

Weight:12 ounces

Package: 1 PCS Soap dish
feature_bullets: Material: Made of high quality SUS304 stainless steel and premium ceramic
Dual-layer design easy to clean, keeps soap bars clean and off of countertops
Anti-slip: there is a silicone anti-slip mat, which can keep your soap box clean and not slipping
Elegant and generous design highlight your taste, great in the kitchen or bathroom
Dimension: Stainless steel tray: 3.9 x 2.8 inch; ceramic dish: 4.7 x 3.6 x 1.1 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars637 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
